short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a switch to toggle statuses of installed extensions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension to switch on/off installed extensions quickly. 

You just have to click the name of the extension you want to switch. This extension has that simple function and is as small as possible.

This is useful especially for developers and people who make use of many extensions.

Thank you for kind reviews. The developer reads all the reviews :)
